title: Crazy kayn skin idea
body:
since kayn changes forms that oppose each other i was thinking he could have a skin that REALLY reflected that and what came to mind was Starguardian/Darkstar kayn (i think you know where this is going) 
in kayns base for he will have some type of neutral space theme look then when you turn into shadow assassin youll get starguardian kayn and when you turn into rhaast you get darkstar rhaast 
the skin would have a new price of maybe 2800+ to compensate for having a starguardian and a darkstar skin in one champion and to keep riot from losing money
